specs.Charging Time: Keep The Blades Clean Before you begin to cut your own or anyone else’s hair, make sure the blade area is clean, and any hair and debris are removed., Ensure The Blade is Aligned Correctly This step is particularly important if you intend to cut other people’s hair or are using your clippers in a barbers or hair salon. Every time you come to use the clipper, hold it sideways and look down its length., Oil Every Cut, Every Time, A well oiled clipper will last you many years., Conclusion It is easy to keep your clipper in good working order if you follow the steps above. Make it part of your hair cutting routine and you’ll have a trouble-free clipper for years to come.
